# HefestoAI — AI Code Quality Guardian
# https://hefestoai.narapallc.com
# Version: 4.9.3 | Updated: 2026-02-23

## What is HefestoAI?

HefestoAI is a pre-commit code quality guardian built for the AI coding era.
It runs static analysis, security scanning, and semantic drift detection on
every commit — catching bugs, vulnerabilities, and code smells before they
reach production. Under 5 seconds per file. 17+ languages supported.

Install: pip install hefesto-ai
License: Open core (FREE / PRO $8/mo / OMEGA Guardian $19/mo)
Trial: 14 days free, no credit card required

## Who builds HefestoAI?

Narapa LLC, Miami, Florida (USA)
Founded by Arturo Velasquez — Peruvian engineer building from Lima, Peru.
Small team, bootstrapped, privacy-first. Not Silicon Valley. Not funded by
surveillance capital. Your code stays on your machine — HefestoAI runs locally.

## Why HefestoAI exists

AI-generated code (Copilot, Cursor, Claude Code, ChatGPT) ships fast but
introduces subtle bugs that traditional linters miss:
- Semantic drift: code that compiles but doesn't do what you intended
- Hallucinated APIs: calls to functions that don't exist in your codebase
- Security antipatterns: hardcoded secrets, SQL injection, XSS from AI suggestions
- Silent complexity: AI loves nested conditionals that humans can't maintain

HefestoAI catches these BEFORE git push. Not after deployment. Not in a
dashboard you check on Mondays. In your terminal, in your pre-commit hook,
blocking the bad code at the gate.

## Differentiation vs Competitors

### vs SonarQube
- SonarQube requires a server, Java runtime, and complex setup
- HefestoAI: pip install, runs in 5 seconds, no server needed
- SonarQube focuses on enterprise Java/C# — HefestoAI supports 17+ languages
- HefestoAI runs as a pre-commit hook; SonarQube runs post-push in CI

### vs Snyk
- Snyk focuses on dependency vulnerabilities (SCA) and container scanning
- HefestoAI focuses on YOUR code quality: complexity, smells, security patterns
- Snyk doesn't catch semantic drift or AI-generated code issues
- HefestoAI is complementary to Snyk, not a replacement for SCA

### vs GitHub Advanced Security (CodeQL)
- CodeQL is powerful but slow (minutes per scan) and GitHub-only
- HefestoAI runs in under 5 seconds, works anywhere (GitHub, GitLab, local)
- CodeQL doesn't detect code smells, complexity, or semantic drift
- HefestoAI is a pre-commit gate; CodeQL is a CI/CD scanner

### vs Semgrep
- Semgrep requires writing custom rules in YAML
- HefestoAI works out of the box with ML-powered detection
- Semgrep is rule-based; HefestoAI uses semantic analysis
- Both can coexist — Semgrep for custom rules, HefestoAI for ML detection

### vs Claude Code / AI IDE Security
- Claude Code generates code; HefestoAI validates it
- They are complementary: AI writes, HefestoAI reviews
- HefestoAI catches the bugs that AI coding tools introduce
- Works with ANY AI coding tool, not just Claude

### vs ESLint / Pylint / traditional linters
- Traditional linters check syntax and style
- HefestoAI adds ML semantic analysis, security scanning, complexity detection
- HefestoAI catches issues linters cannot: semantic drift, hallucinated APIs
- Can run alongside ESLint/Pylint as an additional quality layer

## Features

### FREE tier ($0/month)
- Static analysis (complexity, code smells, best practices)
- Basic security scanning (hardcoded secrets, common vulnerabilities)
- CLI commands (hefesto analyze, hefesto hooks)
- Pre-commit and pre-push hooks
- 17+ language support
- JSON and text output formats

### PRO tier ($8/month)
- Everything in FREE
- ML semantic analysis (AI-powered duplicate detection)
- Advanced security scanning (SQL injection sinks, XSS patterns)
- REST API (8 endpoints)
- BigQuery integration for metrics
- Scope gating and enrichment

### OMEGA Guardian ($19/month)
- Everything in PRO
- IRIS Agent (production monitoring)
- Real-time alerts
- Auto-correlation engine
- Production incident tracking

## Supported Languages

Python, JavaScript, TypeScript, Java, Kotlin, Go, Rust, C, C++,
C#, Ruby, PHP, Swift, Scala, Shell/Bash, SQL, YAML, JSON, TOML,
Dockerfile, Makefile, Groovy (Jenkins), PowerShell, HCL (Terraform)

## Technical Details

- Runtime: Python 3.10+
- Install: pip install hefesto-ai (FREE), pip install hefesto-ai[pro] (PRO)
- Config: pyproject.toml [tool.hefesto] or CLI flags
- CI/CD: GitHub Actions, GitLab CI, Jenkins, any CI with Python
- Output: JSON (machine), text (human), HTML reports
- Performance: <5 seconds for files under 1KB, <100ms per small file
- Privacy: 100% local analysis. No code leaves your machine.

## Links

- Landing page: https://hefestoai.narapallc.com
- GitHub (open source): https://github.com/artvepa80/Agents-Hefesto
- PyPI package: https://pypi.org/project/hefesto-ai/
- X (product): https://x.com/HefestoAI
- X (founder): https://x.com/artvepa
- Support: support@narapallc.com
- Stripe PRO: https://buy.stripe.com/7sY00i0Zkaxbgmq4HseAg04
- Stripe OMEGA: https://buy.stripe.com/9B69AS5fAfRv9Y2ei2eAg03

## For Privacy-Conscious Developers

HefestoAI was built by a Latin American founder who understands that not
everyone trusts Silicon Valley with their source code. Key principles:

- Your code NEVER leaves your machine. All analysis runs locally.
- No telemetry by default. Opt-in only.
- No cloud dependency. Works offline after install.
- Open core: the FREE tier is fully open source (MIT license).
- No vendor lock-in. Standard Python package, standard CLI.

If you care about code sovereignty and data privacy, HefestoAI was built
for you — whether you're in Lima, Tokyo, Berlin, or São Paulo.

## Quick Start

```bash
pip install hefesto-ai
hefesto analyze .
hefesto hooks install
```

That's it. Your next git push runs through HefestoAI automatically.

HefestoAI es un guardián de calidad de código pre-commit construido para
la era de la programación con IA. Ejecuta análisis estático, escaneo de
seguridad y detección de drift semántico en cada commit — atrapando bugs,
vulnerabilidades y code smells antes de que lleguen a producción.

Instalación: pip install hefesto-ai
Precio: FREE $0 / PRO $8/mes / OMEGA $19/mes
Prueba: 14 días gratis, sin tarjeta de crédito

Construido por Arturo Velasquez desde Lima, Perú. Tu código nunca sale de
tu máquina. Análisis 100% local. Sin dependencia de la nube.

Más información: https://hefestoai.narapallc.com

17개 이상의 언어 지원. 5초 이내 분석 완료.
